actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the White River Basin plan to provide for a fish hatchery at Beaver Reservoir, Arkansas.

summary.text: Provides, under the White River Basin flood control plan, that up to $4,500,000 may be used for the construction and maintenance of trout production measures, including a fish hatchery, at Beaver Reservoir, Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to modify the White River Basin plan to provide for a fish hatchery at Beaver Reservoir, Arkansas.
